mapper.insert: insert into board_mst values( 0, #{board_img}, #{board_content}, #{user_id}, now(), now() );
mapper.select: SELECT bm.id, bm.board_img, bm.board_content, bm.user_id, um.username, bm.update_date FROM board_mst bm LEFT OUTER JOIN user_mst um ON(bm.user_id = um.id) WHERE um.username = #{username} ORDER BY update_date desc;
